function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for covid-19 patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of covid-19 identification systems into wearables may lead to a false sense of security and reduced adherence to other preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and data security risks associated with the collection and transmission of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for wearables due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Acceleration of iot adoption in healthcare sector due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of wearable devices for tracking and contact tracing during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to extensive interviewing and interaction with people from various companies and organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 during extensive literature review and database searching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote work and telehealth leads to higher risk of contagious disease propagation through increased interaction in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on technology for essential social interactions may lead to decreased in-person social connections, which can impact mental health and well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards technology-driven future may lead to increased cyber security risks and vulnerabilities, especially with the collection and sharing of personal and sensitive data for remote transactions and interactions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective ai-based approaches for eradicating pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial stress impacting technology adoption in the short-term","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of user cooperation in contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers in adopting iot-based healthcare","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 through iot devices and technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data security in iot devices used for covid-19 management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot technology for disease management and control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on iot in different sectors impacted by covid-19 may overlook specific health risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less strict stance on privacy issues","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stricter cleaning and tracking requirements for businesses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recession impacting automotive companies’ ability to invest in iot initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow adoption of iot technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on digital transformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of indicators in global green building certification and rating systems to address pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited consideration of certification and rating systems and focus on environmental and social sustainability only","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of viruses through touch surfaces and shared spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to virus propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy use and lack of backup energy sources","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of response to preventing virus propagation pvp2 in the health & safety category","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Missed responses to mental health mh2 and mh3 in the health & safety category","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of response to wastewater management wwm1, wwm2, wwm3 in the health & safety category","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of pathogens through air and water systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of pathogens through wastewater and waste management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor and activity spaces leading to poor mental health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gaps in casbee’s response to prevention of virus propagation indicators pvp1, pvp2, and pvp3","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missing indicators for water management in the environmental resources category","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Partially addressed indicators in personal comfort and local services categories","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prevention of virus propagation indicators missing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health indicators missing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air quality indicators missing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of viruses due to surface contact in the building","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to outdoor spaces and greenery","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsafe drinking water and wastewater management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of virus propagation prevention indicators in leed standards","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missing waste management and mental health subcategories in leed standards","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coverage for energy use and comfort indicators in leed standards","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
